name: Bishop Theophilus Finding the Grave of Saint Anthony

description: Bishop Theophilus Finding the Grave of Saint Anthony; Master of the Brussels Romuléon or workshop (Flemish, active about 1465); Brussels (probaby), Belgium; about 1465 - 1470; Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 24.8 × 17.6 cm (9 3/4 × 6 15/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig XI 8, fol. 29; J.
